column3: There's plenty of oppurtunities to get Scholarships at Purdue!
Lots of places on Campus only take Cash...Or Dining Dollars. Or Boiler Express.

column1: Christmas Gift from the Parents - Collect $100
column3: They might not be living with you anymore, but nothing says 'I love you' more than an envelope full of money!
Amidst all the gifts they give you, there's always that one friend that just hands you some cash.
Whether you break your arm skateboarding or come down with the flu, PUSH is always there... to bleed you dry.
The Bursar's Office is after you. Pay your tuition or suffer their wrath!

column1: Go out for Roomate's Birthday -- Lose $25
column3: Your roommate has had to suffer living with you. The least you can do is get them a nice gift for their birthday, and maybe buy them a drink.
Turns out getting good grades can get you money!
Many Krannert students are known to invest in stocks on the side. You got in on some of that action!
You have won second prize in a beauty contest. First prize went to Purdue Pete.
Lots of places to get a job around campus... Not all of them are glorious, but money is money.
Student organizations don't fund themselves. Pay your dues.
